title: 1950's sign font...
content:
Hey all, trying to find what font this is or something similar. Tried LHF Bounce and some others but nothing I've found so far fits the bill. Thanks!

Shown here with "a feast for the eyes": [http://www.flickr.com/photos/28034866@N08/4021689815/](http://web.archive.org/web/20110619080930/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/28034866@N08/4021689815/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/28034866@N08/4021689815/")
author: staybeautiful

comments.content:
"a feast for the eyes" would have been hand-drawn back then.

- Lex

A few that come to mind that have a similar feel:  
 [Murray Hill](http://web.archive.org/web/20110619080930/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/murray-hill/)  
 [Monterey](http://web.archive.org/web/20110619080930/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/monterey/)  
 [Holiday Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20110619080930/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/holidayfonts/viewfonts) and [House Casual](http://web.archive.org/web/20110619080930/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/signpainterfontkit/viewfonts) from House Industries.  
 [Sweetheart Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20110619080930/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/typadelic/sweetheart-script/)  
 [Refreshment Stand,](http://web.archive.org/web/20110619080930/http:/www.fontdiner.com/main.html) from FontDiner
